first_translate: it feels like  there is something terribly evil inside that darkness.
too terrible for me to even look at...!

hangle: 그래도 피오나를 구할 수 있는 방법은 하나뿐이야.
first_translate: but if we want to save her, there's only one thing we can do.
don’t you care about living anymore, siegren?

hangle: 저 어둠에 잠시 틈을 내는 것 정도는 할 수 있겠지?
first_translate: can you make  a small opening into that darkness?
and create an opening in the darkness!
did I mess up big time?!
how did things end up like this?

hangle: 분명 어둠에 있던 무언가를 상대하고 있었던 것 같은데.
first_translate: I was fighting against whatever was inside that darkness just moments ago.

hangle: 왜 정신을 차리니 옷 벗은 너랑 누워 있는 거야.
first_translate: why am I lying next to you without any clothes when I wake up?
for a second,  I thought maybe I died and went to heaven or something.
everyone was so worried sick about you,
and yet you say such things?! how dare you?!
anyway, where are we right now?
an emergency tent set up in the forest.

hangle: 본부 쪽은 어둠이 와서 초토화가 되었으니까.
first_translate: the base camp has been destroyed by the darkness.

hangle: 네 몸이 너무 안 좋아서, 당장 영주의 성으로 이동할 수가 없었어.
first_translate: we couldn’t move you immediately because you weren’t well enough to travel all the way back to airelle castle.

hangle: 다른 사람들은 모두 무사하니까 걱정하지 마.
first_translate: don’t worry. everyone else is safe.
no, stay down and rest some more.

hangle: 날 구하기 위해서 다른 사람들이 얼마나 고생했을지,
first_translate: I wanna know what happened while people tried to rescue me from the darkness,

hangle: 내가 어둠 속에서 본 게 뭔지…
first_translate: as well as everything I saw within it...
I feel like getting out of bed right away and finding answers.

hangle: 알고 있어. 실은 돌아다닐 힘도 없다고.
first_translate: I already knew that. besides, I don’t have the strength to walk around anyway.

hangle: 그래도 꼭 하고 싶은 게 하나 있어.
first_translate: still, there’s something I must do first.
you remind me of a child.
nearby city affected by the damage
I was seriously concerned she might not survive.
she had fallen unconscious, and her body temperature dropped significantly.
well, thank goodness nothing bad happened.
do you think his grace and prince siegren will agree with you?
please keep this secret from duke airelle...

hangle: 주군께 감히 비밀을 만들 수는 없죠.
first_translate: there’s no way I could hide secrets from him.

hangle: 그 후에 다른 사람들에게 감사 인사를 잔뜩 받았다.
first_translate: I received lots of thanks afterward.

hangle: 아카데미 연구원들은 물론이고, 엑스트라 기사들도 날 찾아왔었지.
first_translate: researchers from the academy came looking for me, along with knights from the order of rouge.

hangle: 영지의 주인인 렐턴 후작도 우리를 환대하며
이번 일로 유니스의 힘에 가능성이 있다는 것도 확인했으니,
first_translate: thanks to this incident, we also confirmed that eunice may possess potential powers.

hangle: 일이 꽤 잘 풀렸다 할 수 있겠어.
first_translate: all in all, things turned out pretty good.
en route to marquess relton’s manor
there are still many questions left unanswered...

hangle: 어둠 속의 그 사람은 대체 누구일까?
first_translate: just who exactly was that person I met in the darkness?
or perhaps he was merely a hallucination?
but would the darkness show illusions too...?
I guess thinking won’t help much.
right before being sucked into the darkness,
I managed to stop the darkness from approaching me.
